title: [1.5.2~1.6.4][smp]GoodNight'sSleep梦境mod[永久更新]探索你的梦境[bate2.3.2]
txt_content:
本帖最后由 贰逼 于 2013-11-20 19:14 编辑 

接下来搬运的是国外的梦境mod  Good Night's Sleep




1.jpg (32.45 KB, 下载次数: 490)

下载附件

2013-8-7 15:30 上传




mod作者：
-tippyfoo/bob0productions


这里是 mod介绍
———————————————————————————————————————————————前言
首先要推荐更新的1.6.2版本
进入噩梦美梦这两个世界方法就是睡觉
不过要在特制的床上[具体教程中]
夜晚/白天睡觉后随即进入随机/对应一个梦境

1.6.2更新后你只有20分钟时间探索[可以是用特制食品延长或缩短]，而1.5.2版本只有死后会醒来。
不必担心物品消失，它有独特的物品信息保存系统


mod教学1[ThnxCya]
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XNjA5Mjk5OTA4.html
mod教学2[PopularMMOs]
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XNjA5ODQ2OTcy.html
mod宣传片[tippyfoo]
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XNjA5MzIzMTU2.html

特性：

-梦境是两种平行的空间。
-梦境传送不是用门，而是用床。
-梦境中死后玩家将会醒来。
-玩家可以随意穿行另一个梦境。
-噩梦的合成表基本上完全是平行于好梦的。
-最新版本中加入蠹虫、女巫等所有让你生畏的怪物（末影龙、凋零除外，巨人的BUG修复中）

环境

美梦：




4.jpg (39.8 KB, 下载次数: 486)

下载附件

2013-8-7 15:36 上传





一个相当于普通世界的环境。有地形，有植被，作物，各种可以利用的物品，以及生物。最值得一提的是有海绵生成。时间基本定格为白天
噩梦：




6.jpg (12.97 KB, 下载次数: 460)

下载附件

2013-8-7 15:38 上传





环境多为高山覆盖，大面积岩浆，充满危险，时间基本定格为黑夜。[1.6.2更新后产生可见月亮]


生物：

美梦：




5.jpg (33.04 KB, 下载次数: 500)

下载附件

2013-8-7 15:41 上传





特有生物：婴儿爬行者、小熊糖。[婴儿爬行者破坏力极大，伤害较小，不过爆炸后会形成和闪电爬行者相当的坑，会燃烧周围的方块。小熊糖类似铁傀儡可以召唤出来]
普通生物：基本所有被动生物
噩梦：




2013-07-13_142051_5933731.jpg (17.85 KB, 下载次数: 491)

下载附件

2013-8-7 15:48 上传





常见的所有攻击性生物，包括地狱的僵尸猪人。（BUG，僵尸巨人无法自然生成）1.5.2更新后出现him，1.6更新暂时移除


物品：

合成表：




8.jpg (20.28 KB, 下载次数: 520)

下载附件

2013-8-7 15:47 上传





美梦：
糖果矿会产生糖果，打掉糖果草也会产生糖果，四个糖果合成糖果块，可以打造糖果全套。
糖果分解糖果粉，当然甘蔗提取的糖也可以合成。糖果粉和希望蘑菇加碗可以合成希望蘑菇煲。




3.jpg (19.56 KB, 下载次数: 485)

下载附件

2013-8-7 16:07 上传





美梦中树木种类也不同，树叶也不同。

彩虹矿物冶炼成彩虹锭，彩虹锭可以合成彩虹全套、彩虹末端的金子[需要炼药锅和金块]
、以及彩虹块。
[注：糖果矿颜色是黄色及粉色的请与彩虹矿区分]
棒棒糖：右键对准所有泥土能够种上糖果草。

Positite矿石：类似钻石，和钻石差不多，不过需要冶炼。颜色为黄色、可以合成Positite块和彩虹召唤台，以及直接传送美梦的豪华的床

其他方块类似主世界，除了水中会生成海绵。
礼物：破坏礼物会随机掉落高奖励物品

希望蘑菇：用于和糖果粉末合成希望蘑菇煲，缩短美梦时间。可以用金坷垃催化，主世界中也会生成。与绝望蘑菇和床合成陌生的床
噩梦：

和美梦平行的世界，物品本质差不多了，名字有差别

Zitrite矿（黑暗物质）：平行于彩虹矿。挖掉后需要冶炼，合成Zitrite工具，或Zitrite块
Negatite矿：平行于Positite，需冶炼。可以合成全套，制造Negatite块、和直接传送噩梦的猥琐的床。
Necrum腐烂组织，合成工具，Necrum块。

绝望蘑菇：用于和腐烂组织粉末和碗合成绝望蘑菇煲，缩短噩梦时间。可用金坷垃催化。
通用物品：
陌生的床：希望蘑菇+绝望蘑菇+床  ，用于传送随机的梦境。[梦游：在梦境中另一地点安放陌生的床，会传送到离原地点一定距离的地方，类似地狱门机制。]

正在更新矿物中 ，预计在后续版本中完善BUG及更新更多方块，请持续关注！
[具体请自行体验，祝您游戏愉快！]

一些指南[必看]


寻找一个合适的床
想要有一个生动的梦，就要有一个合适的床。
床有三种：陌生的、豪华的、猥琐的。
每个人都会得到一个REM(产生梦)的状态。
陌生的床可以通过希望蘑菇和绝望蘑菇还有一张普通的床制作。
豪华/猥琐的床需要通过Positite/Negatite矿石和一张普通的床制作。

什么时候睡觉
随时。正如我们大多数人一样会午睡。


怎么睡觉
右击床。


警告：
建议避免在猥琐的床上睡觉。因为它将带你去一个无比危险、怪物重重的噩梦，除非你拥有豪华的床。


延长/缩短梦境：
你需要希望蘑菇煲缩短美梦时间、绝望蘑菇煲缩短噩梦时间。
当然死后你也会醒来。

醒来：
等到太阳落山的好梦、或噩梦月亮下降，你可以消耗特定的蘑菇煲来促进这一过程
[在梦境中死、等待时间流逝、消耗特定物品、以及得到陌生的床都会醒来]

[彩虹矿]
附彩虹召唤方式：
彩虹召唤台：
彩虹锭、彩虹锭、彩虹锭
彩虹锭、金块   、彩虹锭
彩虹锭、炼药锅、彩虹锭

放到任意方块上即可召唤彩虹，破坏彩虹后彩虹消失，用稿子挖掉后重新放置，彩虹出现。
合成表大图：
http://cdn2.planetminecraft.com/files/resource_media/screenshot/1332/recipes_GoodNightsSleep_5933767.jpg
（目前只有美梦，噩梦正在持续更新中）

———————————————————————————————————————————————
更新及消息

关于所有更新（红字为当前版本）
1.5.2：
I'm not quite sure if this is compatible with the new launcher. Other than that, it is a usual forge install with a README file
1.6.2 bate1.0
- nighmare trees
- gumdrop = seeds texture bug is no more
- despair mushrooms should use other item to grow, necrotic extract
- necrotic extract (recipe: 1 zombie flesh)
- repairable tools
- Positite tool names!
- fixed multiblock textures
- made nightmare presentable
- Nightmare grass
- bed overworld gen (1/100 chance per chunk, assuming flat terrain)
- make compatible with 1.6.2
- Nightmare mushroom gen
- Nightmare has a visible moon
- grass gen in nightmare
- tree gen in nightmare
- NIGHTMARE GRASS IS EVIL!!! >:D
- got rid of bats in good dream
- fixed baby creeper ghost bug
- new bed recipe
- made item/block id's more compatible with other mods
- negatite tools
- negatite ore yields negatite
- generations for negatite ore
- corrected positite hoe texture
- added "nether splashes" to nightmare
- made nightmare more hilly
- temporarily removed herobrine
1.6.2 bate2.0
- players will spawn on overworld grass platforms in the nightmare
- beds will now set player's spawn point
- limited dream time, players are teleported back after 20 min
- luxurious and wretched stew
- stews can transfer players to overworld if consumed in opposite dream
- stews can reset dream timer if consumed in corresponding dream
- made negatite items less durable and candy armor slightly more durable
- added necrum tools for nightmare (rotting tissue material)
- added zitrite tools for nightmare (darkness material)
- nightmare tools are unenchantable
- reduced zombie pigman spawn rate in nightmare
- added silverfish, witches, and blazes to the nightmare
- tried and failed to add giant zombies. But you can still have a spawn egg!
- zitrite ore is smelted into zitrite ingots to craft zitrite items
- zitrite and necrum ores spawn in the nightmare
- stews are craftable
- improved clicking on the beds, using a totally different event method to teleport the player
- stews aren't consumed when in creative mode, but still have same effect
- candy is converted directly to powdered sugar, and necrum is converted directly to necrotic extract
- added Solid Necrum, which is crafted from 4 necrum (parallel to hard candy)
- added Negatite and Zitrite blocks
- added a strange bed, which teleports players to a dream at random; it is crafted from a hope, despair, and bed
- luxurious/wretched beds are now crafted from one bed and one positite/negatite
- improved special mushroom generation in overworld
- removed bed generation in overworld
- enirboreh evomer ot deliaf
1.6.2 bate2.2
- Added method that automatically assigns item ID's if they are incompatible with other ID's
- Added method that automatically assigns block ID's if they are incompatible with other ID's
- Added ItemGNS.cfg file created on startup that allows alteration of itemID's
- Added BlockGNS.cfg file created on startup that allows alteration of block ID's
- Fixed a bug preventing players from mining shadow stones or negatite blocks
- Enirboreh evomer ot deliaf
1.6.2 bate 2.2.1
-\ fixed bug in which the negatite pickaxe was replaced with a negatite axe

-\ Lolipops are in item form in the decorations tab, now
BUG：- There is a derpy big tree gen bug that makes the big trees look like lollipops.

- Armor textures for nightmare materials have not been added yet.

- ID assigning methods are brand new and may have some issues when used with certain mods. Please tell me if this happens!

- This mod is not server-compatible
2.3-\ Added Tormenter with AI similar to that of zombies. They drop Necrum

-\ server capability added

-\ dead wood recipe bug

-\ XP bar no longer seemingly empties upon entering a dream

-\ chance of Rainbow Ore dropping itself is changed to 50%

-\ Rainbow Ore does not drop coal anymore

-\ increased compatibility of dream dimension id's by setting them to 242 and -242 instead of 2 and -2
bug
- There is a derpy big tree gen bug that makes the big trees look like lollipops.

- Armor textures for nightmare materials have not been added yet.

- Server compatibility has only recently been added, so there may be some notable bugs on a modded server.

*IMPORTANT: IF YOU ARE USING A WORLD PREVIOUSLY MADE WITH THIS MOD, YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO ENTER THE DREAMLANDS IN THAT WORLD!!!*
2.3.2for1.6.4
-\ stews now work in the nightmare again

-\ strange bed no longer crashes game upon clicking on it

-\ added a goodnightssleep config directory

-\ added a DataGNS file

-\ increased compatibility with other biome mods (new biome id generator method)

-\ updated for 1.6.4 compatibility; this does not work with 1.6.2!

-\ Enirboreh evomer ot deliaf
bug
- There is a derpy big tree gen bug that makes the big trees look like lollipops.

- Armor textures for nightmare materials have not been added yet.

- Server compatibility has only recently been added, so there may be some notable bugs on a modded server.

*IMPORTANT: IF YOU ARE USING A WORLD PREVIOUSLY MADE WITH THIS MOD, YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO ENTER THE DREAMLANDS IN THAT WORLD!!!*



作者更新留言
Eventually, the mod will be complete with a variety of ores/materials, mobs, dungeons, bosses, and maybe even custom sound effects.
最终，此mod会完成各种矿石/材料、怪物、地牢、boss，甚至自定义音效。

附安装方法：

首先你得下载的Forge 全版本forge下载点我

安装JAVA SE二进制及以上版本（java6及以上）
然后把你下载的zip拖入.minecraft/versions/(forge_version)/(forge_version).jar中
如果你觉得麻烦，直接拖入mods文件中。

下载地址

http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=1711116084&uk=4094783090
注：下载对应版本亲进入对应版本的文件夹寻找合适版本的文件
